subject: Baseball
Pro Bowl
Steroids
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Baseball needs a rule stating that any player who tests positive for a banned substance will not be eligible for the All-Star Game, and voting should be taken out of the hands of fans.
snippet: Baseball needs a rule stating that any player who tests positive for a banned substance will not be eligible for the All-Star Game, and voting should be taken out of the hands of fans.
